alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 6:45PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...RIVER RISES DUE TO MELTING SNOWPACK... UNSEASONABLY WARM TEMPERATURES ACROSS THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE OVER THE PAST SEVERAL DAYS HAS RESULTED IN EXCESSIVE SNOWMELT AT HIGHER ELEVATIONS. AS A RESULT, WATER LEVELS IN RIVERS AND STREAMS THAT HAVE THEIR ORIGINS IN THE MOUNTAINS HAVE BEEN RISING SINCE THIS PAST SUNDAY AND CONTINUE TO RISE TODAY. GREATEST RATES OF RISE ARE OCCURRING FROM LATE EVENING TO EARLY MORNING. WITH ONE MORE DAY OF VERY WARM DAYTIME HIGHS, RIVERS AND STREAMS ARE EXPECTED TO RISE ONCE AGAIN THIS EVENING AND MAY APPROACH BANKFULL LEVELS. THERE IS A GREAT DEAL OF UNCERTAINTY REGARDING EXACTLY HOW HIGH THE TAIYA AND CHILKAT RIVERS WILL RISE, AS THE REMAINING AMOUNT OF HIGH ELEVATION SNOWPACK IS UNKNOWN. A HYDROLOGIC ADVISORY IS ISSUED WHEN SIGNIFICANT RIVER RISES ARE EXPECTED OR OCCURRING, BUT FLOOD IS NOT EXPECTED. THIS STATEMENT WILL BE UPDATED AS REQUIRED OR WHEN NEW INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
